title: Medieval 2 Total War Overview By The Creative Assembly

json.text: (Well it's rated now, It's 16+.... :D)
Medieval II, Total War. Is A Game
That Combines a Intern-Based Strategy Element, Played Out,
On A Global Map.
With Epic -
Real Time Battles, Played Out On Huge,
Realistic Battlefields.
Medieval's II Grand Campaign Spends The Year 1080, To 1530, And
Challenges You, To Take Control, Of One Of Seventien Nations,
And Steer Them, To Global Domination.
You I'll Use Diplomancy, Espionage, Trade,
Religion,
And Military Might,
On Your Path To Victory,
This Is The Most Turbelent of times,
This.. Is Total War!
Hello There, I´m Ken Turner, Lead Programmer Of The Creative Assembly, and
I´m Gonna Take You Through A Basic Overview Of A Game,
Medieval II Total War,
In The Grand Campaign You i'll Begin With Your Chosen Nation And Start With A Number
Regions Under Your Control.
Your Objective, Is To Build Up These Regions By Developing Your City´s And
Castle's, Through Construction And New Building's what Intern Unlock new
Technologie's,
These allow to create a cast of new Characters,  Such as Princesses, Priests,
And Merchants, That you can use to gain advantage over Rival Nations on the map,
Through diplomacy, religion and Trade.
More Significantly, They allow you to Recruit bigger, and better Army's
Your Army's have been put to use and seek to expand your Empire across the map..
Move a army into Enemy territory, to clash with the rival army, and the game
Transports you to the Battlefield..
Here, you take control of your Troops in real time,
And use real well tactics, and strategie's, to Triumph,
Use a combination of Infantry, Archers, Cavalry and Artillery to help you
Claim victory in the Battlefield,
Capture enemy castle's and city's to expand your Kingdom,
And Ultimately archieve your objective, to become the world's
Dominant Faction..
That include's a basic view overview of the game,
Join us in the coming months, as we take a closer look at the elements
In the campaign,
And the strategie's of the battlefield,
As we examine, Medieval II, Total war!
